attributes.action: Have each Cabinet Minister walk the streets 1 night each week alone in a City area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To sit pontificating in the House of Commons or in Cabinet meetings is the cowards way out.Those in the Forces and in the Police do it to establish what the problems are,so are we paying Political cowards to hide from reality,yet administrate our lives.
